participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and a bit impatient, she enjoys deep conversations.
participant_1.background: i'm a christian. i enjoy listening to classical music. my sister is a pole dancer. my favorite color is red.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Reflective and wise, he shares stories of the past with a hint of humor.
participant_2.background: i'm very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television.
